desc:
Magic wards deflect attacks. Increase the armor's item bonus to AC by 1. The armor can be etched with one property rune.

You can upgrade the armor potency rune already etched on a suit of armor to a stronger version, increasing the values of the existing rune to those of the new rune. You must have the formula of the stronger rune to do so, and the Price of the upgrade is the difference between the two runes' Prices.
name: Armor Potency (+1)
craftRequirement: You are an expert in Crafting.

desc: Light seems to partially penetrate this armor.
name: Invisibility

activities.desc: Whispering the command word, you become invisible for 1 minute, gaining the effects of a 2nd-level invisibility spell.
activities.name: Invisibility Rune

desc:
Resilient runes imbue armor with additional protective magic. This grants the wearer a +1 item bonus to saving throws.

You can upgrade the resilient rune already etched on a suit of armor to a stronger version, increasing the values of the existing rune to those of the new rune. You must have the formula of the stronger rune to do so, and the Price of the upgrade is the difference between the two runes' Prices.
name: Resilient

desc: Light seems to partially penetrate this armor.
name: Invisibility (Greater)
subTypeDesc: You can activate the armor up to three times per day.

activities.desc: Whispering the command word, you become invisible for 1 minute, gaining the effects of a 2nd-level invisibility spell.
activities.name: Greater Invisibility Rune: 1st activation

activities.desc: Whispering the command word, you become invisible for 1 minute, gaining the effects of a 2nd-level invisibility spell.
activities.name: Greater Invisibility Rune: 2nd activation

activities.desc: Whispering the command word, you become invisible for 1 minute, gaining the effects of a 2nd-level invisibility spell.
activities.name: Greater Invisibility Rune: 3rd activation
